SELECT d.pollutecode, FORMAT(MAX(`maxvalue`), st.numprecision) AS maximumValue, FORMAT(MIN(`minvalue`), st.numprecision) AS minimumValue, FORMAT(AVG(`avgvalue`), st.numprecision) AS averageVlaue, COUNT(*) AS sumValue, SUM(CASE WHEN d.dataflag!='F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS validValue FROM
T_ENV_MONI_AIR_DATASATA d
T_PS_BAS_GAS_DATASATA d
T_PS_BAS_WAT_DATASATA d
JOIN T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE st ON st.pollutecode = d.pollutecode WHERE d.monitortype=2 AND d.pointcode IN
#{pointCode}
AND d.pollutecode IN
#{polluteCode}
AND d.datatime >= #{startTime} AND d.datatime <= #{endTime} GROUP BY pollutecode ORDER BY d.datatime ASC

SELECT A.POINTCODE, B.POINTNAME, SUBSTR(A.DATATIME,1,19) DATATIME, A.POLLUTECODE, B.POLLUTENAME, A.DATAFLAG, FORMAT(A.AVGVALUE, B.NUMPRECISION) AS DATAVALUE, C.SUNIT,FORMAT(C.SMINVALUE, B.NUMPRECISION) AS SMINVALUE,FORMAT(C.SMAXVALUE, B.NUMPRECISION) AS SMAXVALUE FROM
T_ENV_MONI_AIR_DATASATA A
T_PS_BAS_GAS_DATASATA A
T_PS_BAS_WAT_DATASATA A
LEFT JOIN V_ENV_STATIONPOLLINFO B ON B.POLLUTECODE=A.POLLUTECODE LEFT JOIN V_BAS_POLLSTD C ON C.POINTCODE = A.POINTCODE AND C.POLLUTECODE=A.POLLUTECODE AND C.SYSTEMTYPE =#{systemType} WHERE A.MONITORTYPE=2
AND A.POINTCODE IN
#{pointCode}
AND A.POLLUTECODE IN
#{polluteCode}
AND A.DATATIME >= #{startTime} AND A.DATATIME <=#{endTime} ORDER BY A.DATATIME ASC

SELECT A.DATATIME FROM
T_ENV_MONI_AIR_DATASATA A
T_PS_BAS_GAS_DATASATA A
T_PS_BAS_WAT_DATASATA A
LEFT JOIN V_ENV_STATIONPOLLINFO B ON B.POLLUTECODE=A.POLLUTECODE WHERE A.MONITORTYPE=2
AND A.POINTCODE IN
#{item}
AND A.POLLUTECODE IN
#{item}
AND A.DATATIME >= #{startTime} AND A.DATATIME <= #{endTime} GROUP BY A.DATATIME ORDER BY A.DATATIME ASC
